title: Apple cake traybake
ingredients: ['200g unsalted butter, softened', '200g caster sugar', '375g plain flour', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon', '3 eggs, beaten', '1.5kg apples - peeled, cored and sliced', 'raisins (optional)', 'unsalted butter for brushing', 'caster sugar for sprinkling']
